Mechanics.Trigger: Rolling doubles, triples, or more during spellcasting rolls.

Severity.Doubles: Nuisance Surge — minor or cosmetic effects.
Severity.Triples: Moderate Surge — impactful but survivable effects.
Severity.Four or more of a kind: Extreme Surge — dangerous, chaotic, potentially lethal effects.

Mechanics.Usage: When a Wild Surge is triggered, roll d100 on the corresponding table based on severity.
